original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1101)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(736)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並集結己部隊士兵對前方進行衝鋒，同時在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4621)@</color> 秒內提升自身 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4621)@</color> 點速度，以及士兵 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4626)@</color> 點速度。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1101)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(736)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy in the front range, and gathers soldiers of your own troops to charge forward, and at the same time increases in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4621)@</color> seconds Self <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4621)@</color> point speed, and soldiers <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4626)@</color> point speed.
